feat.name: Ability Focus (Witch Hex ~ Misfortune)
feat.description: One of this creature's special attacks is particularly difficult to resist.
feat.benefit: Choose one of the creature's special attacks. Add +2 to the DC for all saving throws against the special attack on which the creature focuses. Special: A creature can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time the creature takes the feat, it applies to a different special attack.

feat.name: Craft Wand
feat.benefit: You can create a wand of any 4th-level or lower spell that you know. Crafting a wand takes 1 day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. To craft a wand, you must use up raw materials costing half of this base price. A newly created wand has 50 charges. See the magic item creation rules in Chapter 15 for more information.

feat.name: Extra Hex (2x)
feat.description: You have learned the secrets of a new hex.
feat.benefit: You gain one additional hex. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this hex. Special - You can gain Extra Hex multiple times.
feat.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.160

feat.name: Improved Familiar
feat.description: This feat allows you to acquire a powerful familiar, but only when they could normally acquire a new familiar.
feat.benefit: When choosing a familiar, the creatures listed below are also available to you (see the Pathfinder RPG Bestiary for statistics on these creatures). You may choose a familiar with an alignment up to one step away on each alignment axis (lawful through chaotic, good through evil).

feat.name: Quicken Spell
feat.description: You can cast spells in the fraction of the normal time.
feat.benefit: Casting a quickened spell is a swift action. You can perform another action, even casting another spell, in the same round as you cast a quickened spell. A spell whose casting time is more than 1 round or 1 full-round action cannot be quickened. A quickened spell uses up a spell slot four levels higher than the spell's actual level. Casting a quickened spell doesn't provoke an attack of opportunity.

feat.name: Split Hex
feat.description: You can split the effect of one of your targeted hexes, affecting another creature you can see.
feat.benefit: When you use one of your hexes (not a major hex or a grand hex) that targets a single creature, you can choose another creature within 30 feet of the first target to also be targeted by the hex.

feat.name: Alertness (Granted)
feat.description: You often notice things that others might miss.
feat.benefit: You get a +2 bonus on Perception and Sense Motive skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.

special_quality.name: Cackle (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 23 The witch can cackle madly as a move action. This hex can be used only once per round. Any creature that is within 30 feet that is under the effects of an agony hex, charm hex, evil eye hex, fortune hex, or misfortune hex caused by the witch has the duration of that hex extended by 1 round.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.66

special_quality.name: Cantrips
special_quality.description: You can prepare a number of cantrips, or 0-level spells, each day. These spells are cast like any other spell, but they are not expended when cast and may be used again.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.65

special_quality.name: Darkvision (Ex)
special_quality.description: Range 60 ft.; Darkvision is the extraordinary ability to see with no light source at all, out to a range specified for the creature. Darkvision is black and white only (colors cannot be discerned). It does not allow characters to see anything that they could not see otherwise-invisible objects are still invisible, and illusions are still visible as what they seem to be. Likewise, darkvision subjects a creature to gaze attacks normally. The presence of light does not spoil darkvision.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Bestiary

special_quality.name: Deliver Touch Spells (Su)
special_quality.description: Your familiar can deliver touch spells or hexes for you. If you and your familiar are in contact at the time you cast the touch spell, you can designate your familiar as the "toucher". Your familiar can then deliver the touch spell just as you would. As usual, if you cast another spell before the touch is delivered, the touch spell dissipates. If you activate a hex, your familiar can be used to make the touch. You do not have to be in contact with your familiar to use this ability.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.69

special_quality.name: Elements Patron
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide

special_quality.name: Evil Eye (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 23 The witch can cause doubt in the mind of a foe within 30 feet that you can see. The target takes a -4 penalty on one of the following (witch's choice): AC, ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, or skill checks. This hex lasts for 10 rounds. A Will save reduces this to just 1 round. This is a mind-affecting effect.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.66

special_quality.name: Familiar's Alertness ability Active (Ex)
special_quality.description: PC has a familiar that has the Alertness (Ex) ability and it is within arms' reach, the master gains the Alertness feat.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Core Rulebook

special_quality.name: Fiendish Language (Ex)
special_quality.description: Tieflings speak either Abyssal or Infernal.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Bestiary, p.169

special_quality.name: Fiendish Resistance (Ex)
special_quality.description: Tieflings have cold resistance 5, electricity resistance 5, and fire resistance 5.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Bestiary, p.169

special_quality.name: Fiendish Sorcery (Ex)
special_quality.description: Tiefling sorcerers with the Abyssal or Infernal bloodlines treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer class abilities.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Bestiary, p.169

special_quality.name: Flight (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 23 The witch grow lighter as you gain power, eventually gaining the ability to fly. The witch can use feather fall on herself at will and gain a +4 racial bonus on Swim checks. She can cast levitate on herself once per day. The witch may fly, as per the spell, for 13 minutes per day. These minutes do not need to be consecutive, but they must be spent in 1-minute increments.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.66

special_quality.name: Fortune (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 23 The witch can grant a creature within 30 feet a bit of good luck for 2 round. The target can call upon this good luck once per round, allowing him to reroll any ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check, taking the better result.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.66

special_quality.name: Healing (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 23 The witch may heal with a touch, this acts as a cure moderate wounds spell, using the witch's caster level.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.66

special_quality.name: Hex
special_quality.description: Witches learn a number of magic tricks, called hexes, that grant them powers or weaken foes. At 1st level, a witch gains one hex of her choice. She gains an additional hex at 2nd level and for every 2 levels attained after 2nd level, as noted on Table 2-10. A witch cannot select an individual hex more than once. Unless otherwise noted, using a hex is a standard action that does not provoke an attack of opportunity. The save to resist a hex is equal to 10 + 1/2 the witch's level + the witch's Intelligence modifier. Witches learn a number of magic tricks, called hexes, that grant them powers or weaken foes. Unless otherwise noted, using a hex is a standard action that does not provoke an attack of opportunity. The save to resist a hex is 23.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide

special_quality.name: Major Hex - Retribution (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 23 For 7 rounds, immediately after the hexed creature deals damage in melee, it takes half that damage (round down). This damage bypasses any resistances, immunities, or damage reduction the creature possesses. A Will save negates this effect.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.68

special_quality.name: Misfortune (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 25 For 2 rounds, anytime the creature makes an ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check, it must roll twice and take the worse result. A Will save negates this hex.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.66

special_quality.name: Resistance to Cold (Ex)
special_quality.description: You may ignore 5 points of Cold damage each time you take cold damage.
special_quality.aspect: Ability Benefit: 5, Resistance: Cold, ResistanceOutput: Cold 5
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Bestiary, p.303

special_quality.name: Resistance to Electricity (Ex)
special_quality.description: You may ignore 5 points of Electricity damage each time you take electricity damage.
special_quality.aspect: Ability Benefit: 5, Resistance: Electricity, ResistanceOutput: Electricity 5
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Bestiary, p.303

special_quality.name: Resistance to Fire (Ex)
special_quality.description: You may ignore 5 points of Fire damage each time you take fire damage.
special_quality.aspect: Ability Benefit: 5, Resistance: Fire, ResistanceOutput: Fire 5
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Bestiary, p.303

special_quality.name: Skilled (Ex)
special_quality.description: Tieflings have a +2 racial bonus on Bluff and Stealth checks.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Pathfinder Player Companion: Blood of Fiends, p.169

special_quality.name: Slumber (Su)
special_quality.description: DC 23 If the creature fails a will save, it falls into a deep, magical sleep for 13 rounds. This hex can affect a creature of any HD.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.66

special_quality.name: Spell-Like Ability (Sp)
special_quality.description: Tieflings can use darkness 1/day as a spell-like ability.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Pathfinder Player Companion: Blood of Fiends, p.169

special_quality.name: Witch's Familiar
special_quality.description: You form a close bond with a familiar, a creature that teaches you magic and helps to guide you along your path. Your familiar also aids you by granting you skill bonuses, additional spells, and help with some types of magic. These special abilities apply only when you and your familiar are within 1 mile of each other. The familiar stores all the spells that you know.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.67

special_quality.name: Witch Patron Spells
special_quality.description: At 1st level, when a witch gains her familiar, she must also select a patron. This patron is a vague and mysterious force, granting the witch power for reasons that she might not entirely understand. While these forces need not be named, they typically hold influence over one of the following forces. At 2nd level, and every two levels thereafter, a witch's patron adds new spells to a witch's list of spells known. These spells are also automatically added to the list of spells stored by the familiar. Spells marked with an asterisk (*) appear in Chapter 5 of this book. The spells gained depend upon the patron chosen. Each patron is listed by its theme. Its actual name is up to the GM and the witch to decide.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide

special_quality.name: +1 Skill Bonus (Knowledge (Local), Knowledge (Local), Perform (Oratory), Survival)
special_quality.description: GM awarded PC with +1 skill bonus.
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Core Rulebook

special_quality.name: +1 Skill Rank (Diplomacy, Linguistics, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive, Sense Motive)
special_quality.description: GM awarded PC with +1 skill rank (won't exceed max ranks).
special_quality.associated: Diplomacy,Linguistics,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive,Sense Motive
special_quality.source: Paizo Inc. - Core Rulebook

special_attack.name: Major Hex - Ice Tomb (Su)
special_attack.description: DC 23 A storm of ice and freezing wind envelops one creature within 60 feet, which takes 3d8 points of cold damage and is paralyzed and unconscious but does not need to eat, drink or breathe while the ice lasts. A target that succeeds at a Fortitude save takes half damage and is not imprisoned. The ice has 20 hit points; destroying the ice frees the creature, which is staggered for 1d4 rounds after being released. Under temperate conditions, the ice lasts 1 minute per witch level. In tropical environments it might only last half as long. In cold environments where ice and snow persist without melting, it might last indefinitely. Whether or not the target's saving throw is successful, it cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

trait.name: Indomitable Faith
trait.description: You were born in a region where your faith was not popular, but you still have never abandoned it. Your constant struggle to maintain your own faith has bolstered your drive. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Will saves.

trait.name: Reactionary
trait.description: You were bullied often as a child, but never quite developed an offensive response. Instead, you became adept at anticipating sudden attacks and reacting to danger quickly. You gain a +2 trait bonus on Initiative checks.
trait.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.328

character.weapon_proficiencies: Battle Aspergillum, Bayonet, Blowgun, Boar Spear, Boarding Pike, Brass Knife, Brass Knuckles, Cestus, Club, Heavy Crossbow, Light Crossbow, Dagger, Chain Dagger, Punching Dagger, Dart, Gaff, Gauntlet, Spiked Gauntlet, Grapple, Hair, Hanbo, Hook Hand, Javelin, Khakkhara, Kumade, Kunai, Longspear, Heavy Mace, Light Mace, Mere Club, Morningstar, Pliers, Quarterstaff, Rock, Shortspear, Sickle, Skull, Sling, Spear, Boar Spear, Ray Spells, Touch Spells, Splash Weapon, Stake, Stingchuck, Stonebow, Unarmed Strike, Underwater Heavy Crossbow, Underwater Light Crossbow, Weighted Spear
character.languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Gnome, Goblin, Goblinoid, Halfling, Infernal, Orc, Read Lips, Sylvan, Thassilonian, Varisian

spell.name: Darkness
spell.effect: This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.263

spell.description: This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.

spell.name: Feather Fall
spell.effect: The affected creatures or objects fall slowly.
spell.target: 13 Medium or smaller free-falling objects or creatures, no two of which may be more than 20 ft. apart
spell.description: The affected creatures or objects fall slowly.

spell.name: Levitate
spell.effect: Levitate allows you to move yourself, another creature, or an object up and down as you wish.
spell.target: You or one willing creature or one object [total weight up to 1300 lbs.]
spell.description: Levitate allows you to move yourself, another creature, or an object up and down as you wish.

spell.name: Arcane Mark
spell.effect: This spell allows you to inscribe your personal rune or mark.
spell.target: One personal rune or mark, all of which must fit within 1 sq. ft.
spell.description: This spell allows you to inscribe your personal rune or mark.

spell.name: Bleed
spell.effect: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying.
spell.description: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying.

spell.name: Dancing Lights
spell.effect: You create up to four lights that resemble lanterns or torches.
spell.target: Up to four lights, all within a 10-ft.-radius area
spell.description: You create up to four lights that resemble lanterns or torches.

spell.name: Daze
spell.effect: This spell clouds the mind of a humanoid creature with 4 or fewer Hit Dice so that it takes no actions.
spell.target: One humanoid creature of 4 HD or less
spell.description: This spell clouds the mind of a humanoid creature with 4 or fewer Hit Dice so that it takes no actions.

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.effect: You detect magical auras.
spell.description: You detect magical auras.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.effect: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.
spell.target: Or Area one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
spell.description: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.

spell.name: Guidance
spell.effect: This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.
spell.description: This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.

spell.name: Light
spell.effect: This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch.
spell.description: This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch.

spell.name: Mending
spell.effect: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.
spell.target: One object of up to 13 lb.
spell.description: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.

spell.name: Message
spell.effect: You can whisper messages and receive whispered replies.
spell.description: You can whisper messages and receive whispered replies.

spell.name: Putrefy Food and Drink
spell.effect: Makes food and water inedible.
spell.target: 13 cu. ft. of food and water or one potion; see text

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.237

spell.description: Makes food and water inedible.

spell.name: Read Magic
spell.effect: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.
spell.description: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.

spell.name: Resistance
spell.effect: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.
spell.description: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

spell.name: Spark
spell.effect: Ignites flammable objects.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.246

spell.description: Ignites flammable objects.

spell.name: Stabilize
spell.effect: Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points.
spell.description: Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points.

spell.name: Touch of Fatigue
spell.effect: You channel negative energy through your touch, fatiguing the target.
spell.description: You channel negative energy through your touch, fatiguing the target.

spell.name: Burning Hands
spell.effect: A cone of searing flame shoots from your fingertips dealing 5d4 points of fire damage to any creature in the effect area.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.251

spell.description: A cone of searing flame shoots from your fingertips dealing (min(5,CASTERLEVEL))d4 points of fire damage to any creature in the effect area.

spell.name: Cause Fear
spell.effect: The affected creature becomes frightened.
spell.target: One living creature with 5 or fewer HD
spell.description: The affected creature becomes frightened.

spell.name: Chill Touch
spell.effect: A touch from your hand, which glows with blue energy, disrupts the life force of living creatures dealing 1d6 points of damage.
spell.saveinfo: Fortitude partial or Will negates; see text
spell.description: A touch from your hand, which glows with blue energy, disrupts the life force of living creatures dealing 1d6 points of damage.

spell.name: Command
spell.effect: You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity.
spell.description: You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity.

spell.name: Cure Light Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+5 points of damage.
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Decompose Corpse
spell.effect: Turn corpse into clean skeleton.
spell.description: Turn corpse into clean skeleton.

spell.name: Enlarge Person
spell.effect: This spell causes instant growth of a humanoid creature, doubling its height and multiplying its weight by 8.
spell.description: This spell causes instant growth of a humanoid creature, doubling its height and multiplying its weight by 8.

spell.name: Ill Omen
spell.effect: Target rolls twice for checks and attacks and uses worst roll.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.229

spell.description: Target rolls twice for checks and attacks and uses worst roll.

spell.name: Mage Armor
spell.effect: An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a mage armor spell, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC.
spell.description: An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a mage armor spell, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC.

spell.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
spell.effect: A coruscating ray springs from your hand, the subject takes a penalty to Strength equal to 1d6+5.
spell.description: A coruscating ray springs from your hand, the subject takes a penalty to Strength equal to 1d6+(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/2))).

spell.name: Ray of Sickening
spell.effect: Ray makes the subject sickened.
spell.description: Ray makes the subject sickened.

spell.name: Reduce Person
spell.effect: This spell causes instant diminution of a humanoid creature, halving its height, length, and width and dividing its weight by 8.
spell.description: This spell causes instant diminution of a humanoid creature, halving its height, length, and width and dividing its weight by 8.

spell.name: Restore Corpse
spell.effect: Skeletal corpse grows flesh.
spell.description: Skeletal corpse grows flesh.

spell.name: Snowball
spell.effect: You conjure a ball of packed ice and snow that you can throw at a single target as a ranged touch attack. The snowball deals 5d6 points of cold damage on a successful hit, and the target must make a successful Fortitude saving throw or be staggered for 1 round.
spell.target: One ball of ice and snow

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Pathfinder Player Companion: People of the North, p.26

spell.description: You conjure a ball of packed ice and snow that you can throw at a single target as a ranged touch attack. The snowball deals (min(5,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of cold damage on a successful hit, and the target must make a successful Fortitude saving throw or be staggered for 1 round.

spell.name: Unseen Servant
spell.effect: An unseen servant is an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command.
spell.description: An unseen servant is an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command.

spell.name: Shocking Grasp
spell.effect: Your successful melee touch attack deals 5d6 points of electricity damage.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.343

spell.description: Your successful melee touch attack deals (min(5,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of electricity damage.

spell.name: Aggressive Thundercloud
spell.effect: Flying storm cloud deals 3d6 electricity damage.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Class Guide, p.172

spell.description: Flying storm cloud deals 3d6 electricity damage.

spell.name: Blindness/Deafness
spell.effect: You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject blinded or deafened, as you choose.
spell.description: You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject blinded or deafened, as you choose.

spell.name: Companion Life Link
spell.effect: Sense whenever your companion is wounded and call out to it in a time of need.
spell.target: one of your animal companions or your familiar

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Class Guide, p.177

spell.description: Sense whenever your companion is wounded and call out to it in a time of need.

spell.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+10 points of damage.
spell.saveinfo: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+(min(10,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: False Life
spell.duration: 13 hours or until discharged; see text
spell.effect: You harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid death.
spell.description: You harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid death.

spell.name: Gentle Repose
spell.effect: You preserve the remains of a dead creature so that they do not decay.
spell.description: You preserve the remains of a dead creature so that they do not decay.

spell.name: Glitterdust
spell.effect: A cloud of golden particles covers everyone and everything in the area, causing creatures to become blinded and visibly outlining invisible things for the duration of the spell.
spell.description: A cloud of golden particles covers everyone and everything in the area, causing creatures to become blinded and visibly outlining invisible things for the duration of the spell.

spell.name: Hold Person
spell.effect: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place.
spell.description: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place.

spell.name: Life Pact
spell.effect: Affected creatures automatically donate hp to stabilize fallen ally.
spell.target: 13 willing living creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Class Guide, p.186

spell.description: Affected creatures automatically donate hp to stabilize fallen ally.

spell.name: Pernicious Poison
spell.effect: Target takes a -4 penalty against poison.
spell.description: Target takes a -4 penalty against poison.

spell.name: Scare
spell.duration: 13 rounds or 1 round; see text for cause fear
spell.effect: This spell functions like cause fear, except that it causes all targeted creatures of less than 6 HD to become frightened.
spell.target: 4 living creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spell.description: This spell functions like cause fear, except that it causes all targeted creatures of less than 6 HD to become frightened.

spell.name: Skinsend
spell.effect: Animate and possess your own skin as if it were a separate creature.
spell.description: Animate and possess your own skin as if it were a separate creature.

spell.name: Spectral Hand
spell.effect: A ghostly hand shaped from your life force materializes and moves as you desire, allowing you to deliver low-level, touch range spells at a distance.
spell.description: A ghostly hand shaped from your life force materializes and moves as you desire, allowing you to deliver low-level, touch range spells at a distance.

spell.name: Steal Voice
spell.effect: Target gains the caster croak spellblight.
spell.description: Target gains the caster croak spellblight.

spell.name: Stricken Heart
spell.effect: Touch attack deals 2d6 damage and staggers target.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Class Guide, p.194

spell.description: Touch attack deals 2d6 damage and staggers target.

spell.name: Summon Monster II
spell.effect: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 2nd-level list or 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.
spell.description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 2nd-level list or 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.

spell.name: Unshakable Chill
spell.effect: Target is afflicted with severe cold.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Ultimate Magic, p.246

spell.description: Target is afflicted with severe cold.

spell.name: Vomit Swarm
spell.effect: Produces a spider swarm that fights for you.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.254

spell.description: Produces a spider swarm that fights for you.

spell.name: Web
spell.effect: Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.368

spell.description: Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them.

spell.name: Flaming Sphere
spell.effect: A burning globe of fire rolls in whichever direction you point and burns those it strikes.
spell.description: A burning globe of fire rolls in whichever direction you point and burns those it strikes.

spell.name: Barrow Haze
spell.effect: Fog obscures the vision of others and extends the range of your hexes.
spell.target: fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Class Guide, p.174

spell.description: Fog obscures the vision of others and extends the range of your hexes.

spell.name: Bestow Curse
spell.effect: You place a curse on the subject.
spell.description: You place a curse on the subject.

spell.name: Catatonia
spell.effect: Make a willing target appear to be dead.
spell.description: Make a willing target appear to be dead.

spell.name: Dispel Magic
spell.effect: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing spell that has been cast on a creature or object, to temporarily suppress the magical abilities of a magic item, or to counter another spellcaster's spell.
spell.description: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing spell that has been cast on a creature or object, to temporarily suppress the magical abilities of a magic item, or to counter another spellcaster's spell.

spell.name: Eldritch Fever
spell.effect: Target gains the eldritch ague spellblight.
spell.description: Target gains the eldritch ague spellblight.

spell.name: Fly
spell.effect: The subject can fly at a speed of 60 feet [or 40 feet if it wears medium or heavy armor, or if it carries a medium or heavy load].
spell.description: The subject can fly at a speed of 60 feet (or 40 feet if it wears medium or heavy armor, or if it carries a medium or heavy load).

spell.name: Howling Agony
spell.effect: Screaming pain limits the target's actions.
spell.target: 13 living creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spell.description: Screaming pain limits the target's actions.

spell.name: Ki Leech
spell.effect: Add to your ki pool when you critically hit.
spell.description: Add to your ki pool when you critically hit.

spell.name: Lightning Bolt
spell.effect: You release a powerful stroke of electrical energy that deals 10d6 points of electricity damage to each creature within its area.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.304

spell.description: You release a powerful stroke of electrical energy that deals (min(10,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of electricity damage to each creature within its area.

spell.name: Marionette Possession
spell.duration: 130 minutes or until you return to your body
spell.effect: As magic jar, but limited to line of sight.
spell.description: As magic jar, but limited to line of sight.

spell.name: Ray of Exhaustion
spell.effect: A black ray projects from your pointing finger. The subject is immediately exhausted for the spell's duration.
spell.description: A black ray projects from your pointing finger. The subject is immediately exhausted for the spell's duration.

spell.name: Remove Curse
spell.effect: Remove curse can remove all curses on an object or a creature.
spell.description: Remove curse can remove all curses on an object or a creature.

spell.name: Remove Disease
spell.effect: Remove disease can cure all diseases from which the subject is suffering.
spell.description: Remove disease can cure all diseases from which the subject is suffering.

spell.name: Sands of Time
spell.effect: Target temporarily ages.
spell.description: Target temporarily ages.

spell.name: Sleet Storm
spell.effect: Driving sleet blocks all sight [even darkvision] within it and causes the ground in the area to be icy.
spell.description: Driving sleet blocks all sight (even darkvision) within it and causes the ground in the area to be icy.

spell.name: Stinking Cloud
spell.effect: Stinking cloud creates a bank of fog like that created by fog cloud, except that the vapors are nauseating.
spell.target: Cloud spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.349

spell.description: Stinking cloud creates a bank of fog like that created by fog cloud, except that the vapors are nauseating.

spell.name: Unliving Rage
spell.effect: As rage, except affecting only undead.
spell.target: 4 willing undead creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Class Guide, p.198

spell.description: As rage, except affecting only undead.

spell.name: Vampiric Touch
spell.effect: Your touch deals 6d6 points of damage.
spell.description: Your touch deals (min(10,floor(CASTERLEVEL/2)))d6 points of damage.

spell.name: Fireball
spell.effect: A fireball spell generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals 10d6 points of fire damage to every creature within the area.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.283

spell.description: A fireball spell generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals (min(10,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of fire damage to every creature within the area.

spell.name: Black Tentacles
spell.effect: This spell causes a field of rubbery black tentacles to appear, burrowing up from the floor and reaching for any creature in the area.
spell.description: This spell causes a field of rubbery black tentacles to appear, burrowing up from the floor and reaching for any creature in the area.

spell.name: Confusion
spell.effect: This spell causes confusion in the targets, making them unable to determine their actions.
spell.description: This spell causes confusion in the targets, making them unable to determine their actions.

spell.name: Crushing Despair
spell.effect: An invisible cone of despair causes great sadness in the subjects.
spell.description: An invisible cone of despair causes great sadness in the subjects.

spell.name: Dimension Door
spell.effect: You instantly transfer yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.
spell.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
spell.description: You instantly transfer yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

spell.name: Enervation
spell.effect: You point your finger and fire a black ray of negative energy that suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes dealing 1d4 temporary negative levels if you hit.
spell.description: You point your finger and fire a black ray of negative energy that suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes dealing 1d4 temporary negative levels if you hit.

spell.name: False Life, Greater
spell.duration: 13 hours or until discharged; see text
spell.effect: Gain 2d10+13 temporary hp.
spell.description: Gain 2d10+(CASTERLEVEL) temporary hp.

spell.name: Familiar Melding
spell.duration: 13 hours or until you return to your body
spell.effect: Possess your familiar.
spell.description: Possess your familiar.

spell.name: Fear
spell.effect: An invisible cone of terror causes each living creature in the area to become panicked unless it succeeds on a Will save.
spell.description: An invisible cone of terror causes each living creature in the area to become panicked unless it succeeds on a Will save.

spell.name: Object Possession (Lesser)
spell.effect: Project your soul into an object, animating it.
spell.description: Project your soul into an object, animating it.

spell.name: Purge Spirit
spell.effect: Deal 13d6 points of damage per level to one haunt or spirit creature and stagger it.
spell.description: Deal (CASTERLEVEL)d6 points of damage per level to one haunt or spirit creature and stagger it.

spell.name: Riding Possession
spell.effect: As possession, but you observe instead of control the subject.
spell.description: As possession, but you observe instead of control the subject.

spell.name: Wall of Blindness/Deafness
spell.effect: Translucent wall blinds or deafens creatures that pass through it.
spell.target: translucent wall 260 ft. long or a translucent ring with a radius of up to 32 ft.; either form 20 ft. high

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Class Guide, p.198

spell.description: Translucent wall blinds or deafens creatures that pass through it.

spell.name: Wall of Ice
spell.effect: This spell creates an anchored plane of ice or a hemisphere of ice, depending on the version selected.
spell.target: Anchored plane of ice, up to 13 10-ft. squares, or hemisphere of ice with a radius of up to 16 ft.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.366

spell.description: This spell creates an anchored plane of ice or a hemisphere of ice, depending on the version selected.

spell.name: Callback (Greater)
spell.effect: If your familiar takes hit point damage while within range of this spell, it immediately teleports to your space after the damage is applied. If it's killed, its corpse teleports instead. Optionally, you can specify a number of points of damage for your familiar to take before the spell takes effect. Once the familiar has teleported back to you, the spell ends.
spell.description: If your familiar takes hit point damage while within range of this spell, it immediately teleports to your space after the damage is applied. If it's killed, its corpse teleports instead. Optionally, you can specify a number of points of damage for your familiar to take before the spell takes effect. Once the familiar has teleported back to you, the spell ends.

spell.name: Curse, Major
spell.effect: As Bestow Curse, but harder to remove.
spell.description: As Bestow Curse, but harder to remove.

spell.name: Duplicate Familiar
spell.effect: You create a duplicate of a familiar. The familiar's master can use the duplicate as if it were his familiar in all respects, though he doesn't gain the bonus special ability from more than one familiar at a time. When the spell's duration expires, the familiar duplicate shrivels into nothing, even if petrified or otherwise transformed.
spell.description: You create a duplicate of a familiar. The familiar's master can use the duplicate as if it were his familiar in all respects, though he doesn't gain the bonus special ability from more than one familiar at a time. When the spell's duration expires, the familiar duplicate shrivels into nothing, even if petrified or otherwise transformed.

spell.name: Feeblemind
spell.effect: Target creature's Intelligence and Charisma scores each drop to 1.
spell.description: Target creature's Intelligence and Charisma scores each drop to 1.

spell.name: Hold Monster
spell.effect: This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects any living creature that fails its Will save.
spell.description: This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects any living creature that fails its Will save.

spell.name: Suffocation
spell.effect: Target quickly suffocates to death.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.248

spell.description: Target quickly suffocates to death.

spell.name: Teleport
spell.effect: This spell instantly transports you to a designated destination, which may be as distant as 100 miles per caster level.
spell.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
spell.description: This spell instantly transports you to a designated destination, which may be as distant as 100 miles per caster level.

spell.name: Flame Strike
spell.effect: A flame strike evokes a vertical column of divine fire dealing 13d6 points of damage.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.283

spell.description: A flame strike evokes a vertical column of divine fire dealing (min(15,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of damage.

spell.name: Cone of Cold
spell.effect: Cone of cold creates an area of extreme cold, originating at your hand and extending outward in a cone, dealing 13d6 points of cold damage.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.258

spell.description: Cone of cold creates an area of extreme cold, originating at your hand and extending outward in a cone, dealing (min(15,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of cold damage.

spell.name: Flesh to Stone
spell.effect: The subject, along with all its carried gear, turns into a mindless, inert statue.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.284

spell.description: The subject, along with all its carried gear, turns into a mindless, inert statue.

spell.name: Heroism (Greater)
spell.effect: This spell functions like heroism, except the creature gains a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks, immunity to fear effects, and temporary hit points.
spell.description: This spell functions like heroism, except the creature gains a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks, immunity to fear effects, and temporary hit points.

spell.name: Raise Dead
spell.effect: You restore life to a deceased creature.
spell.description: You restore life to a deceased creature.

spell.name: Freezing Sphere
spell.effect: Freezing sphere creates a frigid globe of cold energy that streaks from your fingertips to the location you select, where it explodes in a 40-foot-radius burst, dealing 13d6 points of cold damage to each creature in the area.
spell.description: Freezing sphere creates a frigid globe of cold energy that streaks from your fingertips to the location you select, where it explodes in a 40-foot-radius burst, dealing (min(15,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of cold damage to each creature in the area.

spell.name: Heal
spell.effect: Heal enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away injury and afflictions.
spell.description: Heal enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away injury and afflictions.

spell.name: Darkness
spell.effect: This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.

source.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Core Rulebook, p.263

spell.description: This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.

spell.name: Feather Fall
spell.effect: The affected creatures or objects fall slowly.
spell.target: 13 Medium or smaller free-falling objects or creatures, no two of which may be more than 20 ft. apart
spell.description: The affected creatures or objects fall slowly.

spell.name: Levitate
spell.effect: Levitate allows you to move yourself, another creature, or an object up and down as you wish.
spell.target: You or one willing creature or one object [total weight up to 1300 lbs.]
spell.description: Levitate allows you to move yourself, another creature, or an object up and down as you wish.
